title: 15 Best Toys and Gifts for 3-Year-Old Boys, According to Parents and Kids
text:
Once a child turns 3 years old, they'll be approaching the age where socializing and learning their shapes and colors is important. So if you're shopping for a toddler boy, make sure to keep in mind to look out for toys that will help prep them for preschool. To help, here are 16 educational toys for toddlers below that were tested and reviewed by both the Good Housekeeping Institute and real kids. Yep, real kid testers worked with our experts to test and rate hundreds of toys to evaluate factors like safety, quality, and functionality to see which toys were the best of the best. We integrated their feedback and matched them with expert evaluations to guarantee you that these toys would make the best gift ideas for 3-year-old boys.

Don't forget to check out Good Housekeeping's gift guides for kids of all ages, from 2-year-olds to teens.
